titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Atcheson L. Hench Papers Regarding His Interest in Folklore and Mountain Ballads, 1919-1972
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
The Special Collections Department 6599-b

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers Regarding Atcheson L. Hench's Interest in Folklore and Mountain Ballads
1919-1972
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 554 items.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers Regarding Atcheson L. Hench's Interest in Folklore and Mountain Ballads, Accession #6599-b, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Mrs. Oscar W. Underwood, III, Mr. Hench's daughter, gave these papers to the Manuscripts Department on January 1, 1975.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to Atcheson L. Hench's Ballad and Folklore Collection, 1919-1972, consists of ca. 554 items including his correspondence with other folklore specialists, the ballads he personally recorded, his notes on place names, especially "Folly" and the "Hardware River," publications on place names and folklore, and newspaper clippings.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: After the correspondence, the material is arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: A. L. Hench's Correspondence re Folklore 1919-1969
A. L. Hench's collection of newspaper clippings re Folklore 1917-1949
A. L. Hench's printed materials re Place Names 1929-1971
A. L. Hench's Collection of Ballads 1930-1937
A. L. Hench's Collection of Newspaper Clippings re Place Names 1931-1960
A. L. Hench's miscellaneous printed material re Folklore 1936-1966
A. L. Hench's miscellaneous notes re Folklore ca. 1939-1969
A. L. Hench's collection of newspaper clippings re Folklore 1950-1972
A. L. Hench's notes on "Folly" and other place names 1963, n. d.
A. L. Hench's materials and notes on the Hardware/Hardway/Hardway River 1964
